Content-Type: text/plain; charset="US-ASCII"
Content-Transfer-Encoding: 7bit

 I am sad and disqusted with what has transpired this day. I am in sheer 
shock of what has happened. The idea that some dumb fucks felt that they need 
to kill innocent lives to prove thier point are beyond me. I wish I had one 
chance to meet the bastards responsible for this and....but thats not 
important. I wish to send out my hopes that no one in the rpg was hurt or 
killed in this attack. I pray for all the victims and thier familes and 
friends. 

--part1_8e.1ad99a38.28cfae86_boundary
Content-Type: text/html; charset="US-ASCII"
